dishes.name: Taco al Pastor
dishes.description: A spicy taco filled with marinated pork and grilled pineapple.

dishes.name: Mole Poblano
dishes.description: A traditional Mexican sauce made with chiles, nuts, and spices, served over chicken or beef.

dishes.name: Tostadas de Tinga
dishes.description: Crispy tostadas topped with shredded chicken in a chipotle tomato sauce.

dishes.name: Elote Asado
dishes.description: Grilled corn on the cob slathered in mayonnaise, cotija cheese, and chili powder.

dishes.name: Wild Mushroom Risotto
dishes.description: A creamy risotto made with a variety of wild mushrooms and parmesan cheese.

dishes.name: Grilled Asparagus Salad
dishes.description: Grilled asparagus, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and goat cheese, tossed in a lemon vinaigrette.

dishes.name: Pan-Seared Salmon
dishes.description: Pan-seared salmon served with a dill and caper butter sauce and roasted vegetables.

dishes.name: Roasted Eggplant Pasta
dishes.description: Whole wheat pasta tossed with roasted eggplant, sun-dried tomatoes, and a basil-pistachio pesto.

dishes.name: California Roll
dishes.description: A classic sushi roll filled with imitation crab, avocado, and cucumber.

dishes.name: Tiger Roll
dishes.description: A sushi roll filled with eel and topped with avocado and eel sauce.

dishes.name: Sashimi Platter
dishes.description: A selection of thinly sliced raw fish, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

dishes.name: Gyoza
dishes.description: Pan-fried dumplings filled with meat or vegetables.
